Reviews_Description: Good looking car at an affordable price. It's very comfortable and most of all Indian brand.

Tiago NRG is a complete package of safety, looks and features in the segment. It's a value for money car. Will have a different impression and it doesn't just stand out but makes a bold style statement.

Tiago NRG is a budget-friendly car with a good ground clearance but when going off-road, the main problem is the chassis which does not last long and needs to service again and again. Otherwise, it is a nice car.

Rating_Title: Best Car In Terms Of Hatchbacks
Reviews_Description: I have recently bought a Tata Tiago NRG Petrol Automatic. I was so impressed by the performance, and I was most impressed by the huge ground clearance of 181 MM. When I went to Tata's Dealership they said that the car will give 22kmpl mileage while driving on highways and 18.5 in the city, but I am getting 14kmpl in the city and 21km...
Tata Tiago is one of the best cars in its segments with power, music options, safety, mileage and so more features available in this car.

Rating_Title: Best Car In Price Range Under 6 Lakh
Reviews_Description: The awesome car got 17kmpl mileage, and I am using it since 2019. It's a very good car in its price range, if you are buying a Tiago then go for NRG

Rating_Title: Great Car Under 7 Lakhs With Loaded Features
Reviews_Description: Best car under 7lakhs with loaded features. I wanted a good ground clearance car under my budget, and I exactly feel safe with this car. Driver seating comfort is very good. The only thing I won't like is its halogen lighting.
Perfect in performance, best in the service, comfortable for the journey, reliable in fuel consumption, Superb quality for family package

Rating_Title: Best Value For Money Car Under 7 Lakh
Reviews_Description: This is the value for money cars. Best in safety and comfortable seats and awesome infotainment system. I really like this car design there is only cons i.e., automatic ac rest it's the best car under 7 lakh
This is best in its segment. Good job TATA safety, looks, and performance at this cost are excellent.

Not worthy for the price. Go for original Tiago. If not try other companies. Do not bother much about the extra 11mm ground clearance. I don't want to suggest other company models as I think it may look like I like those brands better than Tata. But honestly, I feel this one is costlier.

Nice family car with safety first. Overall car is good space and good ground clearance and good built quality this car, music system one of the best in all car segment one of the premium cars in power
